de.charite.compbio.jannovar.impl.parse.gff

Class GFFParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.impl.parse.gff.GFFParser

  • public final class GFFParser
extends Object
    Parsing for GFF2, GTF, and GFF3 files.
    Author:
    Marten Jaeger, Manuel Holtgrewe

    • Constructor Detail

      • GFFParser

        public GFFParser(String path,
         GFFVersion gffVersion,
         boolean printProgressBars)
        Initalize with path and enforce the given GFF version.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the GFF file to parse
        gffVersion - GFF version to enforce
        printProgressBars - whether or not to print progress bars

      • GFFParser

        public GFFParser(String path)
          throws IOException
        Initialize with path to the file to parse and detect GFF version. For the version detection, the file will be opened and the header will be parsed.
        Parameters:
        path - to the GFF file to parse
        Throws:
        IOException - on problems of opening/reading/parsing path for version detection

    • Method Detail

      • isPrintProgressBars

        public boolean isPrintProgressBars()
        Returns:
        whether or not to print progress bars

        Set whether or not to print progress bars

      • getFile

        public File getFile()
        Returns:
        File to parse

      • getGffVersion

        public GFFVersion getGffVersion()
        Returns:
        version of the underlying GFF file

      • parse

        public void parse(FeatureProcessor fp)
        Parses the file and feed the Feature objects into tmBuilder.
        Parameters:
        fp - FeatureProcessor to use during parsing

      • parseFeature

        public Feature parseFeature(String featureLine)
                     throws FeatureFormatException
        Processes a single feature / line from a GTF or GFF file. For example: 
         chr1 mm9_knownGene exon 3195985 3197398 0.000000 - . gene_id "uc007aet.1"; transcript_id "uc007aet.1";
        Returns a Feature storing the data represented by this line or null if the line contains less than 8 columns separated by '\t'.
        Parameters:
        featureLine - the line of the file as a String
        Returns:
        Feature with the parsed data of featureLine
        Throws:
        FeatureFormatException - in the case of problems in parsing.
